amendment.description: An amendment numbered 11 printed in Part B of House Report 118-216 to increase and decrease the DHS Management Directorate Operations and Support by $10,000,000 to emphasize the importance of reaffirming the states' constitutional and sovereign right to defend their border.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Arrington amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Arrington amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Arrington amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
